scripts.prisma:setup: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate
scripts.start: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts
scripts.start:json: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts --json --runBatch --preClear
scripts.start:csv: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts --csv --runBatch --preClear
scripts.start:all: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts --json --csv --runBatch --preClear
scripts.start:clear: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts --endClear
scripts.start:batch: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts --runOnlyBatch
scripts.start:validation: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/logto/streamUsers.ts
scripts.compare-databases: npm run prisma:setup && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/scripts/compareDatabases.ts
